attributes.action: Give Mr Tony Foulds an MBE
attributes.additional_details: If anyone watched the news they should know how passionate he is about the memorial
attributes.background:
Mr Tony Foulds has been attending a memorial he created and looks after for ten American airman who died tragically in Sheffield during WW2
Which was on BBC news on 22 Feb
I feel he deserves the recognition

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
